meaningMnemonic:
You <kanji>release</kanji> and <kanji>abandon</kanji> something. This is <vocabulary>abandonment</vocabulary>.

放棄 is a relatively formal word for <vocabulary>abandoning</vocabulary> something. It can refer to giving up responsibilities, like neglecting duties or parental obligations, or <vocabulary>relinquishing</vocabulary> entitlements and rights.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
